channel.title: PwnXile PK 317 - Back To Best
channel.description:

[b]Client Mirrors[/b] [url=http://pwnxile.com/play/]Webclient[/url] [url=http://pwnxile.com/client.jar]Downloadable Client[/url]
[url=http://www.pwnxile.com]Forums[/url] [url=http://pwnxile.com/index.php?page=help]How to Play[/url] [url=http://pwnxile.com/vote/]Vote for Rewards[/url]
[img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/6436/025ecc202c8e4b6d8ea6ec9.png[/img]
[b]100% Uptime 400+ Players Online Multiple Connected Worlds Hourly Lottery Works on Windows, Linux and Mac! Dual Xeon X5650. 24 Cores 12GB of RAM. (24GB Burst) DDoS Protected
[img]http://imgtool.in/img/13a63374505d41e.png[/img]
Welcome to PwnXile, the RuneScape private server brought to you by Robbie and Ed. We have hundreds online, playable 24.7 and hundreds of thousands of accounts.
Here at PwnXile we take a different approach than other generic servers you come across. We work endlessly to bring you a dedicated, high performance environment so you can play our enjoyable and content-filled server emulator.
We invest hundreds of dollars into our secure and stable server architecture to ensure dedicated uptime and a fast connection, all protected behind state of the art firewall mechanisms. Security and stability are very important to us, that's why we make sure we are the best around at offering this.
In regard to content, we have a great many minigames to play, such as Castle Wars, Fight Pits and Pest Control, as well as a few others. Each minigame is always actively being played with numerous rewards and incentives available to enhance your gaming experience.
We also have some of the most enjoyable Pking around, our Wilderness zones are always packed with pkers. Why not join them?[/b]
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/9301/19a41613a9184db9a5d0fbb.png[/img]

item.title: PwnXile PK 317 - Back To Best
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:7, topic:449454”]Review:

I have registered on the server and forums because of a close friend that was on this community and because of the memories that I had with this community from the past, however, I was not pleased to know that I was insulted quite constantly from the members and somewhat from the staff team, the staff team are just like the members and just as immature as them (excluding friend).

I create an introduction thread to tell them a little about me and I’m given a statement stating how one does not care, how one does not need to know that much etc., and I’m simply not pleased with the behavior from it. I respect those who respect back, simple as that.

I’ll be taking a leave from that community and will NOT be returning, the member-base is terrible and is terrible, simple as that.[/quote]
That’s what happens in pking servers. You don’t fight someone on their exact terms (i.e you run, you ‘safe’, or anything) then they say “fuck off stupid failed pk3r u suk at life so suck my dick” because they’re oh so hardass

Read full topic

item.title: PwnXile PK 317 - Back To Best
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“PXye, post:6, topic:449454”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=552352.msg4046739#msg4046739 date=1342146776]
Haha PwnScape, I remember that server. I was soooo beastly in the wilderness.
[/quote]
PwnXile offers the same, if not more enjoyment than PwnScape. Come back to PwnXile! We have many great updates and new features to offer![/quote]

Not even remotely close. The PwnScape community was accepting, the PwnXile community is a joke and full of trolls and incompetent tools. As Ix Soulcist xI said, your community is completely disrespectful and you will never have a new player base because your community puts the run on them.

Lame community.

Read full topic

item.title: PwnXile PK 317 - Back To Best
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Review:

I have registered on the server and forums because of a close friend that was on this community and because of the memories that I had with this community from the past, however, I was not pleased to know that I was insulted quite constantly from the members and somewhat from the staff team, the staff team are just like the members and just as immature as them (excluding friend).

I create an introduction thread to tell them a little about me and I’m given a statement stating how one does not care, how one does not need to know that much etc., and I’m simply not pleased with the behavior from it. I respect those who respect back, simple as that.

I’ll be taking a leave from that community and will NOT be returning, the member-base is terrible and is terrible, simple as that.

Read full topic
